sentences: Kas sa suudad seda õigeks panna?
context: Õigeks" on elatiivvorm sõnast õige’ (correct/right). In Estonian, the elative case often indicates movement out of or transformation into a state. When used with verbs like "teha" (to make) or "panna" (to put), it means to make something correct, proper, or right. This form is commonly used when correcting errors or fixing things.
